start.text: What matters more than strength... Is the faith in our victory.
You may deceive your foes, but remember that you must be true to yourself at all times.
All deeds require the same resolve to pull oneself through.
Stay true to your belief, and act for it.

start_boss.text: Let us begin, then. You have come to the point of no return.
I urge you to gain composure. Opening your eyes comes next.

retreat.text: Overconfidence is the greatest enemy. We humbly withdraw.

out_of_missiles.text: There is no halting now. We have already spent all of our ammunition.
We have run out of missiles. Perhaps we should reconsider our tactics.

engaged.text: Relying on brute strength alone to push through is possibly the most impudent thing you could do.
We all simply perform our duties.
In the end, this is all a pointless errand.

need_help.text: One does not easily... Take all possibilities into consideration.

pursuing.text: Boundless pride and ambition will bring about a bitter end.
There cannot be a good reason for me to take their lives, no. I am merely in a hurry to end this work.

running.text: It seems that we must withdraw.

hull_90.text: There is no halting now. We have already made the first step.

hull_50.text: Overconfidence is the greatest enemy. We must humbly keep our post.

hull_30.text: In the end, this is all a pointless errand.
One could make endless questions as to why this must be taken so far.

overload.text: We will recover from this setback, in time.

victory.text: Did you truly believe that there was clear benefit to be react from this battle?
...It seems the work has been done.
